about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the enchanting melodies of the Weakless Digital Soundtrack! Composed by Agnieszka Wlazły, perfectly accompany the visually stunning and emotionally captivating journey of the game, this soundtrack is a masterpiece in its own right.

Each track is carefully crafted to reflect the game's unique atmosphere, transporting you to the magical world of Weakless. From serene, ambient melodies that echo the tranquility of the game's lush environments, to dramatic, orchestral pieces that underscore the most intense moments of the journey, the soundtrack encapsulates the full range of emotions experienced in the game.

The soundtrack contains 20 tracks with a total length of 55 minutes.
